SEARCH
Package client.view

Interface View

All Known Implementing Classes:
TUI
public interface View
This interface represents the generic View of a RemoteClient. Its two possible implementations are TUI and GUI.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    askMovingTilePosition()
    This method handles the request of a user to start picking the PlayableItemTiles from the LivingRoom, while showing the current disposition of the latter, and calls afterward the method askTileToPut that manages the insertion in the personalShelf.
    void
    askNickname()
    This method allows the user to insert the nickname he wants to use during the match
    void
    askPlayerNextMove()
    This method allows the user to choose between the actions to execute during the match depending on the given input on the command line.
    void
    askPlayersNumber()
    This method asks the first user to connect to the RemoteServer to suggest the number of Players for the current game
    String
    askServerInfo()
    This method allows the user to insert the ipAddress of the RemoteServer he wants to connect into.
    int
    askServerPort()
    This method allows the user to insert the information regarding the socket port of the RemoteServer he wants to connect into
    void
    askTileToPut()
    This method handles the request of a user to start inserting the PlayableItemTiles picked from the LivingRoom into the personalShelf while showing the current disposition of the latter.
    void
    fullLobbyTerminateUI()
    This method is called when a user is trying to connect to the server that has already reached its full size
    void
    resetGameOn()
    This method sets the attribute gameOn to false when the user has played his last turn
    void
    riprendiEsecuzione()
    This method is used to release the semaphore.
    void
    setCurrPlayer(String currPlayer)
    This method allows the TUI to save the nickname selected by its user
    void
    setIsTurn()
    This method sets the attribute isLastTurn true only when the last turn played from this user was their last one
    void
    setNickname(String nickname)
    Sets the actual nickname of the user that has joined the game only when its nickname has been previously accepted.
    void
    setPlayerList(ArrayList<Player> playerList)
     
    void
    showLivingRoom(SimpleLivingRoom livingRoom)
    This method prints the latest updated version of the LivingRoom
    void
    showLoginResults(boolean nicknameAccepted, String chosenNickname)
    This method prints the chosenNickname only if the param nickAccepted is true, otherwise it prints a negative comment
    void
    showNickCurrentPlayer(String Nickname)
    This method prints the nickname of the currentPlayer in turn
    void
    showPartialPoint(int point)
    This method prints the current amount of points of a user
    void
    showPlayerShelf(SimpleShelf shelf)
    This method prints the latest updated version of the Shelf of a Player
    void
    showPlayersList(ArrayList<Player> playerList)
    This method prints all the nicknames of all the players in the attribute playerList of this instance
    void
    WriteInChat()
    It is the method that allows the user to write a message to be sent in private or to all Players in the PlayerList of the game

  • Method Details

    • askServerInfo

      String askServerInfo()
      This method allows the user to insert the ipAddress of the RemoteServer he wants to connect into.

    • askServerPort

      int askServerPort()
      This method allows the user to insert the information regarding the socket port of the RemoteServer he wants to connect into

    • askNickname

      void askNickname()
      This method allows the user to insert the nickname he wants to use during the match

    • setCurrPlayer

      void setCurrPlayer(String currPlayer)
      This method allows the TUI to save the nickname selected by its user
      Parameters:
      currPlayer - represents the new current player that is set to the attribute currPlayer of this TUI instance

    • askPlayersNumber

      void askPlayersNumber()
      This method asks the first user to connect to the RemoteServer to suggest the number of Players for the current game

    • askMovingTilePosition

      void askMovingTilePosition()
      This method handles the request of a user to start picking the PlayableItemTiles from the LivingRoom, while showing the current disposition of the latter, and calls afterward the method askTileToPut that manages the insertion in the personalShelf.

    • askTileToPut

      void askTileToPut()
      This method handles the request of a user to start inserting the PlayableItemTiles picked from the LivingRoom into the personalShelf while showing the current disposition of the latter.

    • showLoginResults

      void showLoginResults(boolean nicknameAccepted, String chosenNickname)
      This method prints the chosenNickname only if the param nickAccepted is true, otherwise it prints a negative comment
      Parameters:
      nicknameAccepted - contains the result from the server of the nickname written previously.
      chosenNickname - is the same nickname written when requested

    • showPlayersList

      void showPlayersList(ArrayList<Player> playerList)
      This method prints all the nicknames of all the players in the attribute playerList of this instance

    • fullLobbyTerminateUI

      void fullLobbyTerminateUI()
      This method is called when a user is trying to connect to the server that has already reached its full size

    • showLivingRoom

      void showLivingRoom(SimpleLivingRoom livingRoom)
      This method prints the latest updated version of the LivingRoom

    • showPlayerShelf

      void showPlayerShelf(SimpleShelf shelf)
      This method prints the latest updated version of the Shelf of a Player

    • showNickCurrentPlayer

      void showNickCurrentPlayer(String Nickname)
      This method prints the nickname of the currentPlayer in turn

    • showPartialPoint

      void showPartialPoint(int point)
      This method prints the current amount of points of a user

    • setNickname

      void setNickname(String nickname)
      Sets the actual nickname of the user that has joined the game only when its nickname has been previously accepted.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the instance of nickname of the current TUI

    • setIsTurn

      void setIsTurn()
      This method sets the attribute isLastTurn true only when the last turn played from this user was their last one

    • setPlayerList

      void setPlayerList(ArrayList<Player> playerList)

    • riprendiEsecuzione

      void riprendiEsecuzione()
      This method is used to release the semaphore. Semaphore is a variable used to control the correct execution of the flow of the method init.

    • resetGameOn

      void resetGameOn()
      This method sets the attribute gameOn to false when the user has played his last turn

    • askPlayerNextMove

      void askPlayerNextMove() throws SocketException
      This method allows the user to choose between the actions to execute during the match depending on the given input on the command line. By selecting '1', the user will enter the game turn which consists in picking and putting PlayableItemTiles. The other inputs select different views of the game's database.
      Throws:
      SocketException

    • WriteInChat

      void WriteInChat()
      It is the method that allows the user to write a message to be sent in private or to all Players in the PlayerList of the game
